tasks.tooltip: Feed Minka in the morning once per day.
Walk Minka once in the morning and at least once in the evening.
Open up the chicken coop and make sure their feed trough and water is full.
At dusk after the chickens have returned to the coop, close and lock the doors to ensure predators can't get in.
Clear coffee grounds and foodstuffs from counters then spray and wipe them clean.
Sweep or vaccuum the tile floors of the kitchen area.
If clean dishes are present in the dishwasher, put them away and load it with dirty ones (if any).
If the Dishwasher is full of dishes, add soap and run it. Do this before 8:30PM .
If the stove has a build up of grease, oils or other foodstuffs on it's surfaces spray disinfect and wipe them clean.
Self-explanatory; Sweep the bathroom floor after shaking off area rugs.
Apply toilet bowl cleaner, let sit for ~10 minutes, then scrub clear with brush and flush.
Spray down interior of tub with suitable cleaner to remove grime build up as well as prevent fungal/mold build-up.
Check the lint screen in the dryer to ensure it is completely clear; this should also be done after each load.
Self-explanatory; Sweep the bathroom floor after shaking off the area rugs, and then mop clean.
Self-explanatory; Sweep tor vaccuum the floor of the main living area, including hallways and carpet.
Self-explanatory; Dust all exposed flat surfaces of the common areas.
Check the refrigerator and freezer for any old and expired food; compost it. Take out everything fresh and disinfect the interior and exterior.
Self-explanatory; After sweeping over vaccuuming the floor, mop it to remove residues and disinfect it.
Clean out any trash from the car, clean the windows of any smears and streaks, and vaccuum out any dirt and debris.
Transfer indoor compost from the kitchen to the outdoor drums & disinfect their containers to prevent infestations.
